source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT table_Schema +'.'+TABLE_NAME AS Table_Name 
   FROM information_Schema.tables where table_Schema = 'SalesLT'

activities.name: Copy data from onpremise to Blob

sqlReaderQuery.value: select a.BusinessEntityID,a.JobTitle,a.Birthdate,a.hiredate,a.maritalstatus,b.departmentid from HumanResources.Employee as a inner join HumanResources.EmployeeDepartmenthistory as b on a.BusinessentityID= b.BusinessEntityId where DepartmentId=@{item().DepartmentId}

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesLTCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomerSource
SalesLTCustomer derive(CreatedHash = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName)) ~> DerivedColumnHash
DerivedColumnHash, DimCustomerSource exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimCustomerSource lookup(SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID == DimCustomerSource@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCustomer
LookupCustomer derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate),currentTimestamp(),InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumnDate
DerivedColumnDate alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesLTCustomer@CustomerID,
		Title = SalesLTCustomer@Title,
		FirstName = SalesLTCustomer@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SalesLTCustomer@MiddleName,
		LastName = SalesLTCustomer@LastName,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SalesProductTable
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Pname as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProductSource
SalesProductTable derive(CreatedHash = sha1(Name+ProductNumber+Color)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimProductSource exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimProductSource lookup(SalesProductTable@ProductID == DimProductSource@ProductID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate),currentTimestamp(),InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductID as integer,
		PName as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ProductID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash,
		ProductID = SalesProductTable@ProductID,
		ProductNumber = SalesProductTable@ProductNumber,
		color = SalesProductTable@Color,
		StandardCost = SalesProductTable@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = SalesProductTable@ListPrice,
		PName = Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
Select C.FirstName+' '+C.LastName+' brought '+P.Name+' from '+C.SalesPerson+' worth '+CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), P.ListPrice) 
		from [SalesLT].[Customer] as C
		Inner Join [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader] as S on C.CustomerID=S.CustomerID
		Inner Join [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] as D on S.SalesOrderID=D.SalesOrderID
		Inner Join [SalesLT].[Product] as P on D.ProductID=P.ProductID

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@ProductCategoryID == source2@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = source1@Name,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		ProductCategoryID = source1@ProductCategoryID,
		ParentProductCategoryID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 split( equals(ParentProductCategoryID,1),
	 equals(ParentProductCategoryID,2),
	 equals(ParentProductCategoryID,3),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Category1, Category2, Category3, Category4)
ConditionalSplit1@Category1 sink(input(
		{} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ProductCategory1'],
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ParentProductCategoryID
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Category2 sink(input(
		{} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ProductCategory2'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Category3 sink(input(
		{} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ProductCategory3'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3) ~> sink3
ConditionalSplit1@Category4 sink(input(
		{} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ProductCategory4'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 4) ~> sink4

source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp,
		Status as integer,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(19,4),
		TaxAmt as decimal(19,4),
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		TotalDue as decimal(19,4),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@CustomerID == source2@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		SalesPerson,
		Sales = TotalDue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(SalesPerson),
	Sales = sum(Sales)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SalesPerson,
		Sales
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
